name: Jade Gonzalez
coverLetter:
hello,

It’s with great pleasure Im seeking a Post Harvest Position. I’m confident in my ability to contribute both my knowledge and skills to your organization affectively.


Ive currently been in the medical Marijuana industry for four years starting as a Budtender. I made my way and familiarized myself with all aspects as I could from Receptionist to Management and All the back to production line. I’ve trimmed for multiple facilities in the past year and am looking to continue.


Im eager to the prospect of working with you please don’t hesitate to email me if you have any questions.
